name: Living Dead Syndrome
description:
Living Dead Syndrome is a game about trying to survive in the harsh world that immediately follows that world changing event we see in films and games. Only this time, its different. You have an ATAS with you - An Automated Turret Assembly System. Using this, you can utilize scrap metal you find laying around and turn it into powerful turrets that will protect you from all but the most robust enemies.

Your going to need it, as up against you is a collection of terrible and deadly enemies. Zombie Grunts will shamble towards you in great hordes, while zombie Bashers charge through their ranks and attempt to flatten you with their huge weight and strength, and zombie Screamers that's shriek can almost bring you too your knees, and make other zombies shrug off wounds that would normally kill.

Key Features:

  • Huge swarms of zombies to kill
  • 3 weapon types and 3 turret types
  • 3 Levels to play
  • Tower Defence Elements
  • 3 different enemies to test your mettle

Instructions: 

To play, simply download the file and run the Alpha build .exe within the Alpha Build folder.

  • WASD - Movement
  • Left Click - Shoot
  • Right Click - Open turret selection menu and select turret
